name: Loro
description: A crybaby who is timid and weak, like a newborn animal. Panics when something happens, but has a pure heart and wants to protect others.

passiveSkill.name: Giant Shield
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Loro appears, she grants a {placeholder} HP Shield; her own Block Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Holy Shield
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Strikes the enemy with the energy of shield crystal. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing Block Rate by {placeholder} ."}

specialSkill.name: Flying Shield
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Tosses the huge shield. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing Block Rate by {placeholder} .Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Shield Bash
normalSkill.description: Loro smashes the enemy with her shield. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Strikes the enemy with the energy of shield crystal. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing Block Rate by {placeholder} .
